title: IFTM Research and Innovation Productivity Support Program 09-2020
description: The IFTM Research and Innovation Incentive Program provides financial support to researchers responsible for research and innovation projects underway at IFTM, with the following objectives: 1. Foster scientific and technological research that meets the productive arrangements within the IFTM, in order to assist researchers in the acquisition of inputs, permanent materials, third-party services and others. 2. Stimulate the development of research and innovation projects.

title: Distinguished work
work: SQL Planet - online game for teaching SQL language
event: IX IFTM Scientific Initiation and Technological Innovation Seminar (IX SIN)

title: Distinguished work
work: SQL Planet - online game for teaching SQL language
event: IFTM New Products Fair on the Ituiutaba city

title: Distinguished Scientific Project
work: RPG style game to stimulate the learning for Physics
students: Laura Borges de Freitas, Aurélio Pajuaba Nehme Filho, and Maria Fernanda Nunes Gouveia

title: IFTM Research and Innovation Incentive Program 04-2013
description: The IFTM Research and Innovation Incentive Program provides financial support for participation in events, with the following objectives: 1. Enable the participation of faculty in scientific events; 2. Encourage the dissemination of the results of institutional research; 3. Enable the exchange of experiences between IFTM researchers and other institutions; 4 Contribute to the increase in the quantity and quality of scientific research and technological innovation.
